title: What Will Obama Do About Immigration?
teaser: Lawmakers failed to pass a bill to deal with the flood of unaccompanied minors before leaving on their August recess.
contentencoded:
With Congress on recess, having failed to pass a bill to deal with the flood of unaccompanied minors into the country, President Obama is weighing his various options on how to handle the crisis.

Immigration reporter Alan GomezÂ of USA Today joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to discuss the president’s options.

Guest

  • Alan Gomez, immigration reporter USA Today. He tweets @alangomez.
